![](https://www.hostnamaste.com/images/HostNamaste-Moscow-Russia-and-Mumbai-India-Locations-OpenVZ-7-VPS-Starting-from-$3.99mo.png)

“**[HostNamaste](https://www.hostnamaste.com/)** is a company that was started in March 2016 and has continued to offer hosting ever since. We are focused primarily in the LowEnd market, but it is our philosophy to provide quality services while within the LowEnd market’s price range. While this is certainly the goal of many LowEnd hosting companies, we have been quietly providing our services for nearly 4 years. We are particularly proud to offer many features that cannot often be offered by many LowEnd companies, including 24.7 support, a 07-day money back guarantee, RAID-10 disks and dual processor nodes.”

We are a registered business in the state of Rajkot, Gujarat, India and currently accepting PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards, Alipay, WebMoney, Payoneer, Wallets, Bank Transfers and other **[Payment Methods](https://www.hostnamaste.com/clients/knowledgebase/6/Payments-We-Accept.html)**. You can find our **[TOS/Legal Docs](https://www.hostnamaste.com/tos.php)** here and **[AUP](https://www.hostnamaste.com/aup.php)** here.

We are delighted to announce a brand new data center locations to the HostNamaste lineup - Moscow Russia Datacenter and Mumbai Maharashtra, India Datacenter. These facilities feature the highest levels of redundancy across all Russia and India, Asia. The low latency connectivity to the nearest location makes it the optimal choice for any business that is focused on high server uptime and network performance. 

If your customers are located in Russia and India, Asia, we would recommend that you try our affordable, reliable, cheapest and the best in performance **[Russia OpenVZ 7 VPS](https://www.hostnamaste.com/openvz-vps-moscow-russia.php)** and **[India OpenVZ 7 VPS](https://www.hostnamaste.com/openvz-vps-india.php)** hosting solutions today. The hosting servers are configured with the highly optimized web server technology and powered by Dual Intel E5 Xeon Processors. You can now deliver the blazing fast website experience to your Russian and Indian, Asian users with the latency benefit from our servers.
